body.name: type
body.description: Specifies the job type, such as moderation, transcription, redaction, or export.

body.name: policyId
body.description: Identifier for the moderation policy to apply. Defaults to the server’s standard policy if omitted.

body.name: priority
body.description: Job priority level, affecting processing order and resource allocation.

body.name: webhookId
body.description: Identifier of the webhook to notify upon job completion.

body.name: input
body.description: Job-specific input parameters tailored to the selected job type. Refer to examples for details.

items.name: fileId
items.description: Unique identifier of the file to be processed by the job.

items.name: sampling
items.description: Sampling rate or method applied during data processing.

items.name: frameIntervalMs
items.description: Interval in milliseconds between frames analyzed in video or audio processing.

items.name: maxFrames
items.description: Maximum number of frames to process during video analysis.

items.name: audio
items.description: Audio data or reference used as input for transcription or analysis.

items.name: enabled
items.description: Boolean flag to enable or disable specific job features or options.

items.name: languageHint
items.description: Optional language code to guide transcription or analysis accuracy.

items.name: output
items.description: Specifies the desired format and destination for the job's results.

items.name: includeFindings
items.description: When set to true, the response includes detailed findings and analysis data from the job.

header.name: Idempotency-Key
header.description: Unique key to ensure the request is processed only once, preventing duplicate job creation.

header.name: Authorization
header.description: Bearer token or credentials used to authorize access to the endpoint.

header.name: X-API-Key
header.description: API key used to authenticate the request.

body.name: job
body.description: An object containing the full details of the created job, including its type, status, and associated attributes

items.name: id
items.description: Unique identifier assigned to the created job.

items.name: type
items.description: Specifies the job type, such as moderation, transcription, redaction, or export.

items.name: status
items.description: Current state of the job, such as queued, in_progress, completed, or failed.

items.name: policyId
items.description: Identifier for the moderation policy to apply. Defaults to the server’s standard policy if omitted.

items.name: input
items.description: Job-specific input parameters tailored to the selected job type. Refer to examples for details.

items.name: progress
items.description: Numerical value representing the job's completion percentage.

items.name: percent
items.description: Progress percentage indicating how much of the job has been completed.

items.name: stage
items.description: Current processing stage of the job, providing granular status updates.

items.name: etaSeconds
items.description: Estimated time in seconds remaining until job completion.

items.name: result
items.description: Final processed output or outcome of the job.

items.name: summary
items.description: A concise overview or aggregation of key findings or outputs generated by the job

items.name: decision
items.description: The final outcome of the job, indicating whether the content passed moderation or requires further action.

items.name: maxScore
items.description: The maximum score threshold used to determine content severity or confidence.

items.name: flaggedCategories
items.description: A list of content categories that triggered flags during analysis, highlighting areas of concern.
Reserved for internal use or indexing; typically not used in client requests.

items.name: scores
items.description: A collection of numerical values representing the evaluation metrics or confidence levels for various detected elements within the job
A placeholder for a list or array element; typically represents the first item in an ordered collection

items.name: category
items.description: A higher-level grouping or classification assigned to an element based on its characteristics

items.name: score
items.description: A numerical value quantifying the relevance, accuracy, or quality of a detected item or prediction

items.name: threshold
items.description: The minimum value or score required for an element to be considered valid or to trigger an action

items.name: status
items.description: The current state of the job indicating whether it is pending, in progress, completed, or failed

items.name: findings
items.description: An array of detected items, issues, or results uncovered during the job's processing phase
A placeholder for a list or array element; typically represents the first item in an ordered collection

items.name: type
items.description: The classification or category indicating the nature of the detected item or job operation

items.name: message
items.description: A descriptive string providing additional context, status information, or error details related to the job

items.name: confidence
items.description: A decimal value between 0 and 1 representing the confidence level of a specific detection or classification result

items.name: timestamp
items.description: The exact time point, usually in ISO 8601 format or milliseconds, indicating when an event or detection occurred

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment or event expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment or event expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media

items.name: region
items.description: The spatial area or bounding box defining the location of a detected object within the media

items.name: x
items.description: The horizontal coordinate of a detected region or point within the processed media

items.name: y
items.description: The vertical coordinate of a detected region or point within the processed media

items.name: w
items.description: The width dimension of a detected region or bounding box in pixels

items.name: h
items.description: The height dimension of a detected region or bounding box in pixels

items.name: frameIndex
items.description: The zero-based index of the frame within a video where a particular detection or event occurs

items.name: textSpan
items.description: The range specifying the start and end positions of a text segment relevant to the job's output

items.name: start
items.description: The starting index or position for a segment within the processed media or text content

items.name: end
items.description: The ending index or position for a segment within the processed media or text content

items.name: snippet
items.description: A short excerpt or segment of text or media extracted as part of the job's results

items.name: labels
items.description: A list of descriptive tags or categories assigned to an element based on the job's analysis
A placeholder for a list or array element; typically represents the first item in an ordered collection

items.name: transcript
items.description: Full text transcription generated from the audio input.
Placeholder or index used within arrays or lists, typically representing the first element.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment or event expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment or event expressed in milliseconds from the beginning of the media

items.name: text
items.description: The raw or processed textual content extracted or analyzed during the job

items.name: speaker
items.description: Identifier or label for the detected speaker in the audio transcription.

items.name: words
items.description: Array of word objects representing the detailed transcription output with timing and confidence.
Placeholder or index used within arrays or lists, typically representing the first element.

items.name: startMs
items.description: Start time offset of the segment or word in milliseconds from the beginning of the audio.

items.name: endMs
items.description: End time offset of the segment or word in milliseconds from the beginning of the audio.

items.name: word
items.description: Individual word detected in the transcription output.

items.name: confidence
items.description: A numerical value representing the confidence score of the transcription or analysis result.

items.name: outputFiles
items.description: List of files generated as output from the job, including various formats or processed results.
Placeholder or index used within arrays or lists, typically representing the first element.

items.name: id
items.description: Unique identifier assigned to the job.

items.name: status
items.description: Current state of the job, such as pending, processing, completed, or failed.

items.name: purpose
items.description: The intended function or use case of the job, e.g., moderation, transcription, redaction, or export.

items.name: filename
items.description: Name of the input or output file associated with the job.

items.name: mimeType
items.description: MIME type of the input or output file, indicating its format.

items.name: sizeBytes
items.description: The size of the file or output in bytes.

items.name: checksumSha256
items.description: SHA-256 hash of the file used to verify data integrity.

items.name: storage
items.description: Storage location or method used for the job's files, such as local or cloud.

items.name: provider
items.description: External service or provider responsible for processing the job.

items.name: bucket
items.description: The cloud storage bucket where the job's files are stored.

items.name: key
items.description: A unique identifier or key associated with the job or resource.

items.name: region
items.description: Geographic region or data center where the job is processed or stored.

items.name: createdAt
items.description: Timestamp indicating when the job was created, in ISO 8601 format.

items.name: expiresAt
items.description: Timestamp indicating when the job or resource will expire or be deleted, in ISO 8601 format.

items.name: metadata
items.description: Custom key-value pairs containing additional information submitted with the job.

items.name: reportUrl
items.description: URL linking to a detailed report or summary generated from the job.

items.name: error
items.description: Describes the error encountered during job creation, including error code and message when applicable

items.name: code
items.description: Numeric or alphanumeric status or error code related to the job processing.

items.name: message
items.description: Informational or error message related to the job status or processing.

items.name: retriable
items.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the request can be safely retried in case of failure

items.name: createdAt
items.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the job was initially created

items.name: updatedAt
items.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp indicating the most recent time the job information was modified

items.name: meta
items.description: Contains supplementary metadata about the job or response, including pagination info or related resource details

body.name: error
body.description: Describes the error encountered during job creation, including error code and message when applicable

items.name: code
items.description: A status code representing the outcome of the job creation request, indicating success or the type of error encountered

items.name: message
items.description: A human-readable message providing additional context about the response or error

items.name: details
items.description: Provides additional contextual information or specifics related to the response, such as validation errors or processing notes

items.name: requestId
items.description: A unique identifier generated by the server to trace and support the specific API request
